mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, TITLE, WORKATTRIBUTEID, WORKMOULDID, WORKMOULD, CREATEOPER, CREATETIME, WORK1, WORK2, WORK3, WORK4, WORK5, WORK6, OPERTIME, WARMOPER, FLAG, CORPID, OPENFLAG, OPER, CONTENT, STATUS, PROTOCOLTIME1, PROTOCOLTIME2, UPDATEFLAG, SID from DB_WORKREPORTLOG where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
